dialogue.introduction: Third ship of the Yuugumo class destroyers, Kazagumo. So you're the admiral. Roger. Well then, your orders!
dialogue.library_intro: Fleet type destroyer, Yuugumo class, Kazagumo. Regards. From Midway to Solomon, I advanced around the main battlefields. On that fateful night, I looked upon the burning aircraft carrier. I'll never forget the dragon's last moments.
dialogue.secretary2: I'm Kazagumo. Not "Fuu'un". Understand? Then, it's fine.
dialogue.secretary3: What is it, Admiral? I don't need extra outfitting. Eh, that's not it? Eh?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hey? What is my next mission...? Huh, even though you're that busy... Admiral, I... Ahh... It is okay? Take it easy once in a while? Okay...
dialogue.secretarymarried: What is it? Get it together. If you're not well, I won't be able to do my best either.
dialogue.wedding: What? Calling me to a place like this, Admiral, do you have a new task or something? Eh...! The new task is... meaning, this... put it on... eh...! Me?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Yuugumo-class destroyer, Kazagumo, setting out. Ok? Fleet, sortie!
dialogue.equipment2: What? Torpedoes? It would be nice if they didn't blow up.
dialogue.supply: Thanks for the supplies, Admiral. I'll head out again.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ahh, geez. I can't fight like this! I'm going to hop in the bath for a bit, so don't peek!
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral, a new ship has come. Yeah!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Admiral, the fleet has returned. Good work, everyone.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: 10th DesDiv, sortie! This Kazagumo will take the role of the flagship. Advance!
dialogue.battle_start: I found you! Fleet, prepare for battle, let's do this. Okay?
dialogue.attack: Aim towards the enemy on the starboard side. Begin firing!
dialogue.night_battle: Night... huh. Hiryuu-san... All ships, sortie! We'll annihilate the enemy in the night battle!
dialogue.night_attack: Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
dialogue.mvp: Eh, I... this Kazagumo's battle results... Well, it doesn't... feel bad... I guess!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Mo~u. It hurts! But this won't...!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ehh. They got me. No~, don't explode!
dialogue.sunk: N... Not yet, I'm going to go ahead. I'm... still, going. Still... still...
dialogue.fall_2015: It's gotten a bit chilly, hasn't it. Autumn, huh?. Sweet potatoes. I wanna have a baked sweet potatoe. How about you, Akigumo?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Chrsitmas, Admiral! How delightful. Maybe today i'm down for a booze or two. Ah, I can't?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Squadron 10 on cleaning duty? Roger! I'll be leading the sweeping squad. Akigumo? Ah, she ran away...
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Admiral! I, Kazagumo and the whole Squadron 10 will be in your care this year as well. Let's go, everyone!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, eh? Akigumo, are you drawing an demon mask? Looks pretty good... Wait, that's me?! Why!?

hourly.0000: I, Kazagumo will be in charge for today's hourly notification duty! ...What's with that face? Are you saying that you have a problem with it!?
hourly.0100: Ah, really? Then it's okay... Admiral! It's now precisely 0100!
hourly.0200: It's 0200. Hmm... And that's thatâ™ª It's not a problem right?
hourly.0300: It's 0300, admiral. What? Something about my sister? Yuugumo...? What, You like her!?
hourly.0400: Admiral, it's 0400. Not her? Okay then... Eh, is it about my other sister, Makigumo?
hourly.0500: It is 0500. Oh really? It's not her either. Okay then... Then who are you referring to?
hourly.0600: Your story makes no sense that i forgot it's already morning, admiral. It's 0600.
hourly.0700: It's 0700, admiral. I'll be making breakfast right away. It's OK, leave it to me. I'm surprisingly... Ow! I-I'm okay!
hourly.0800: Admiral, It's 0800. Sorry for taking it so long, but breakfast is ready. Have some! There's even seconds!
hourly.0900: It's 0900, admiral. What, my finger? Oh don't worry, it's not so bad! First aid box, you say? Oh for pete's sake, you're over-exaggerating it, admiral!
hourly.1000: Admiral, it's 1000. It's this late already? Uhh... The sallying fleet and... Ah, the expedition... W-wait...
hourly.1100: It's 1100, admiral. It's almost noon. What's our plan for lunch? Is it at Mamiya's?
hourly.1200: *Nom nom nom* Admiral, it's 1200. *nom nom* Nothing like a curry at Mamiya's for lunch, eh? It's delicious! *nom nom*
hourly.1300: Admiral It's 1300-hmm? Akigumo? What's up? Model for your rough sketch? No! Go find someone else!
hourly.1400: It's 1400, admiral. Phew... Akigumo finally leaves. She's quite the pestering one...
hourly.1500: Admiral. It's 1500. Akigumo? Ah, She's not really that bad. Rather she is... No, i mean... a bit of a bother.
hourly.1600: Admiral, It's 16... Ah, Shoukaku, Good work for today! Zuikaku? No, i don't think she went here...
hourly.1700: It's 1700, admiral. The sunset sure is pretty... Let's go back inside.
hourly.1800: Admiral, 1800. Today's I'll be making dinner... Eh? I'm not doing this out of desperation, I really want to do it. Honest!
hourly.1900: 1900. The admiral ended up making dinner in the end... Down the hatch. Oh, it's delicious! Eh, this one too! But why?
hourly.2000: 2000. So you can cook, admiral. Very good in fact. Where did you learn it? Eh, during your academy years? I see...
hourly.2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Sendai? No, the new squadron 10 was under Yahagi as flagship. I greeted her the other day. Hehehe.
hourly.2200: It's 2200, admiral. Today was quite a day. Thanks for that. Me? I'm fine. I actually worked hard as part of the Squadron 10, you know.
hourly.2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Here, have some tea. Eh? I can do something as easy as serving a tea! What do you expect? Geez... Good night!
